### Approval Action

If this application is approved:

1. Change the status in the application from `"pending"` to `"approved"`
2. Commit the change
3. The automated system will process the application and add it to the friends list

If this application is rejected:

1. Change the status in the application from `"pending"` to `"rejected"`
2. Add a `reason` field explaining why
3. Commit the change
